channel.title: Weather thing. help please? Willing to ++!
channel.description: ok well idk how but now when i log in the smoggy smoke thing apears on the screen and i type ::nosnow then it goes away but then when i log out and log back in it reapears... it gets anoying lol, anyone know what i should do?

item.dc:creator: @largie largie
item.description:
@largie wrote:

yep thats were mine is[br][size=1]Posted on: June 03, 2007, 08:35:27 PM[/size][hr]so it should say:

[weather]
weather= 0

this turns all weather off
